ItemRandoSelector.name: Shops
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Cranky, Funky, and Candy Moves become possible locations for items.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Moves
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Cranky, Funky, and Candy Moves are in the Pool.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Camera & Shockwave
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Camera and Shockwave may not necessarily be the Fairy Queen's gift.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Banana Fairy's Gift
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Fairy Queen's gift will give a random item.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Minecart & Race Checks
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: All banana checks tied to a minecart ride or race.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Gauntlet & Mini-Boss Checks
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: All banana checks which are obtained after killing a hoard of enemies or killing a mini boss.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Snide's Rewards
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: Snide can have random rewards instead of Golden Bananas. Use the Max Snide Reward Limit to customize how many locations will be shuffled.

ItemRandoSelector.name: Snide's Bananas
ItemRandoSelector.tooltip: All banana checks which are obtained after turning in a blueprint are in the pool. Use the Max Snide Reward Limit to customize how many GBs will be shuffled.
